speech: The amount of the TANF benefit is based on the familyâ€™s size and income. When the income does not meet the needs, the family may be approved for TANF for part of the unmet need up to the State maximums. The monthly TANF benefits in Mississippi are limited to $110.00 for the first person, an additional $36 for the second person, and then $24.00 for each additional person. For example, a household with four people receiving the maximum TANF benefit will receive $194.00.
